ygData.subject: Upper Guk - was: PoA bard quests plus a rant
ygData.msgSnippet: Hear hear John. I really encourage those of you that didn t do Upper Guk for experience all through your 20s and 30s to invis and wander around in Upper Guk.
ygData.messageBody:
Hear hear John.

I really encourage those of you that didn't do Upper Guk for experience all
through your 20s and 30s to invis and wander around in Upper Guk. The place
is one of the largest zones in the game and has some really amazing places
in it. Now that I'm starting to play twinks I am really looking forward to
playing in there this time around. If the frogs trained ever so slightly
less (or at least didn't SoW themselves indoors) I think players would
*love* this place.

[44 Bard] Crier (Half Elf) <Seekers of Norrath> ZONE: work


> From: <kim@...>
>
> UGuk is a lot bigger than most people think. There are vast
> areas full of shin warriors and knights most of which will
> give experience up to about 40.
